content.question: Rembrandt’s use of etching in his Self-Portrait with Saskia allowed him to

choices.label: achieve a wide range of different tones
use a woodblock instead of a metal plate

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
